name: Not All That Shines
description:
This is a parody game with a historic twist point in the colonization of America in a parallel world.

How to Play:

Everything is activated with the mouse, there is no special requierements, just the browser's flash plug-in

Art by :

  • Ana Mendez

Programming by :

  • Roberto Bravo
  • Agsalcedo
  • Ricardo Trejo
